ISSUE.TITLE: Add shipment. Allow to mark as Shipped and Delivered
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When add a shipment in admin area (from the order details page) a new store owner doesn't always understand that later he has to mark it as "Shipped" and then as "Delivered". Specifially when he clicks "Save" button (and not "Save and contribute edit"). So let's add two new checkboxes to this page ("add new", not "edit") - "Set as shipped" and "Set as delivered". Hide the second one only when the first one is unchecked

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3944 Added support set Shipped/Delivered, when add Shipping
#3944 Fixed updating order status, when shipping creating with Shipped/Delivered setting
